p: A total of 505 women aged between 18 and 69 years, with a mean age of 38 years (SD = 10.8), were enrolled in this study; a third of the women who participated were between the ages of 30 to 39 years old (32.8%). The majority were Lebanese (63.6%) and housewives (63.6%) (Table 2). As for the marital status, a high number of women were married (86.2%). Most of the women (77.8%) reported having had only one sexual partner while 0.01% had more than three.
